analyzed: na anidassana sappaṭighaḥ na kusalaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā na sanidassana sappaṭigha

original: nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …pe… cha.
analyzed: na kusalam dhammam paṭicca na anidassana appaṭighaḥ na kusalaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā pe cha
translated: With-object-of-consciousness, the indeterminate🔽With-object-of-consciousness, the profitable🔽With-object-of-consciousness, the unprofitable🔽With-object-of-consciousness, the indeterminate🔽With-object-of-consciousness, the profitable🔽With-object-of-consciousness, the unprofitable🔽With-object-of-consciousness, the indeterminate

original: Naanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanasappaṭigho nakusalo
analyzed: na a nidassana sa paṭigham na kusalam dhammam paṭicca na a nidassana sa paṭighaḥ na kusalaḥ
translated: With-object-of-consciousness, the profitable🔽With-object-of-consciousness, the unprofitable🔽With-object-of-consciousness, the indeterminate🔽With-object-of-consciousness, the profitable🔽With-object-of-consciousness, the unprofitable🔽With-object-of-consciousness, the indeterminate🔽With-object-of-consciousness, the profitable

original: dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho
analyzed: dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā na anidassana sappaṭigham na kusalam dhammam paṭicca na sanidassana sappaṭighaḥ

original: nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ
analyzed: na kusalaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā na anidassana sappaṭigham na kusalam dhamma
translated: A profitable, not-inconstant, not-visible-object, not-impact-producing consciousness element arises with a profitable, not-inconstant, not-visible-object, not-impact-producing consciousness element as its condition. …🔽A profitable, not-inconstant, not-visible-object, not-impact-producing consciousness element arises with a profitable, not-inconstant, visible-object, impact-producing consciousness element as its condition. …

original: paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …pe… cha.🔽Naanidassanaappaṭighaṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … cha.🔽Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nakusalañca naanidassanaappaṭighaṁ nakusalañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … cha.
analyzed: paṭicca na anidassana appaṭighaḥ na kusalaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā pe cha  na anidassana appaṭigham na kusalam dhammam paṭicca na anidassana appaṭighaḥ na kusalaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā cha  na sanidassana sappaṭigham na kusalañca na anidassana appaṭigham na kusalañca dhammam paṭicca na sanidassana sappaṭighaḥ na kusalaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā cha
translated: A profitable, not-inconstant, not-visible-object, not-impact-producing consciousness element arises with a profitable, not-inconstant, not-visible-object, not-impact-producing consciousness element as its condition. …🔽A profitable, not-inconstant, visible-object, impact-producing consciousness element arises with a profitable, not-inconstant, visible-object, impact-producing consciousness element as its condition. …🔽A profitable, not-inconstant, visible-object, impact-producing consciousness element arises with a profitable, not-inconstant, not-visible-object, not-impact-producing consciousness element as its condition. …🔽A profitable, not-inconstant, visible-object, impact-producing consciousness element arises with a profitable, not-inconstant, visible-object, impact-producing consciousness element and a profitable, not-inconstant, not-visible-object, not-impact-producing consciousness element as its condition. …

original: Naanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nakusalañca naanidassanaappaṭighaṁ nakusalañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … cha. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na anidassana sappaṭigham na kusalañca na anidassana appaṭigham na kusalañca dhammam paṭicca na sanidassana sappaṭighaḥ na kusalaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā cha
translated: A profitable, not-inconstant, not-visible-object, not-impact-producing consciousness element arises with a profitable, not-inconstant, visible-object, impact-producing consciousness element and a profitable, not-inconstant, not-visible-object, not-impact-producing consciousness element as its condition. …

original: Hetuyā tiṁsa, ārammaṇe nava …pe… aññamaññe pañcavīsa …pe… avigate tiṁsa. (Sabbattha vitthāro.)
analyzed: hetuyā tisa ārammaṇe nava pe aññamaññe pañcavīsa pe avigate tisa sabbattha vitthāro
translated: Thirty in the cause … Nine in the object … Twenty-five in the condition being reversed … Thirty in the unincluded. (In all cases the exposition should be known as above.)

original: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ naakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na sanidassana sappaṭigham na akusalam dhammam paṭicca na sanidassana sappaṭighaḥ na akusalaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta
translated: With object-impression-visible-non-cognizable unprofitable idea, object-impression-visible-non-cognizable unprofitable idea arises as root-cause condition. (In brief.)

original: Hetuyā tiṁsa, ārammaṇe nava …pe… aññamaññe pañcavīsa …pe… avigate tiṁsa. (Sabbattha vitthāro.)
analyzed: hetuyā tisa ārammaṇe nava pe aññamaññe pañcavīsa pe avigate tisa sabbattha vitthāro
translated: In root-cause thirty, in object nine, … in support twenty-five, … in non-hindrance thirty. (In all cases in detail.)

original: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ naabyākataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho naabyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na sa nidassana sappaṭigham na abyākatam dhammam paṭicca na sa nidassana sappaṭighaḥ na abyākataḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta
translated: With object-impression-visible-non-cognizable neutral idea, object-impression-visible-non-cognizable neutral idea arises as root-cause condition. (In brief.)
In root-cause nine. (In all cases nine.)
